care in the world is here.

We found that
the best care could also be
the most sustainable.

We started by using organic bamboo because it grows faster
and requires less water to produce than cotton or rayon
fibers. Itâ€™s also softer and 15% more absorbent.

No plastics
or synthetics.

We got rid of plastic and synthetic components that can sit in landfills for up to 800 years. Even our wrapper is 100% biodegradable.
